SEARCH

Unnamed Package

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Board
    Class to represent the game board The board is a 2D array of tiles onto which the player and bot are placed The board is populated from a map file which is read in using the GameFile class
    BotPlayer
    Extends the Player class to create a bot that can play the game autonomously.
    Game
    Main class to run the game Sets up the game, the board and the players, including placing them on the board First turn handled separately to allow LOOTER to implicitly say HELLO on first turn After that the game loops so long as it isn't lost (winning handled elsewhere)
    GameFile
    Imports the board data from the file, extracting the name, the winning gold amount and the board map.
    Input
    Handles terminal inputs and outputs from the human player during the game Validates the inputs and converts them into the game commands Prints out the relevant responses to these commands
    Location
    Class for representing a location on the board (0,0) represents the lower left corner of the board
    Player
    To represent a player in the game who move around the board, picking up gold before moving to the exit.
